snippet: The Justice Department announced the indictment of five people in connection with the killing of a Border Patrol agent linked to the disputed gun-trafficking investigation called Operation Fast and Furious.
abstract: Justice Department unseals the indictment of five people in connection with the December 2010 killing of a Border Patrol agent linked to the disputed gun-trafficking investigation called Operation Fast and Furious; announcement discloses the names of the defendants, four of whom are fugitives, and the $1 million reward offered by the Federal Bureau of Investigation for any information that leads to their capture.
lead_paragraph: The Justice Department announced the indictment of five people in connection with the killing of a Border Patrol agent linked to the disputed gun-trafficking investigation called Operation Fast and Furious.

headline.seo: Indictment and Reward Revealed Over Operation Fast and Furious
headline.main: File Unsealed in Gun Case in Bid to Find Four Fugitives
headline.print_headline: File Unsealed In Gun Case In Bid to Find 4 Fugitives

keywords.value: Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco and Firearms
